member.name: T:DataGridExtensions.Behaviors.BeginEditOnCtrlEnterBehavior
member.summary: Ctrl+Enter on a cell starts editing the cell without clearing the content.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.Behaviors.BeginEditOnCtrlEnterBehavior.OnAttached
member.summary: Called after the behavior is attached to an AssociatedObject.
member.remarks: Override this to hook up functionality to the AssociatedObject.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.Behaviors.BeginEditOnCtrlEnterBehavior.OnDetaching
member.summary: Called when the behavior is being detached from its AssociatedObject, but before it has actually occurred.
member.remarks: Override this to unhook functionality from the AssociatedObject.

member.name: T:DataGridExtensions.Behaviors.ExtendedStarSizeBehavior
member.summary: Extended start size column behavior. Allows columns to get larger than the client area, but not smaller. The Resizing behavior can be modified using Ctrl or Shift keys: Ctrl resizes all columns to the right proportionally, Shift fits all columns to the right into the client area. A tool tip can be attached to the column headers resizing grippers to help the user with these features.

member.name: F:DataGridExtensions.Behaviors.ExtendedStarSizeBehavior.ColumnHeaderGripperToolTipStyleKey
member.summary: The resrouce key for the default column header gripper tool tip style.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the tool tip for the grippers in the column headers.

member.summary: Identifies the ColumnHeaderGripperToolTipStyle dependency property

member.summary: Filter information about each column.

member.summary: Timer to defer evaluation of the filter until user has stopped typing.

member.summary: The columns that we are currently filtering.

member.summary: Occurs when any filter has changed.

member.summary: When any filter condition has changed restart the evaluation timer to defer the evaluation until the user has stopped typing.

member.summary: Creates a new content filter.

member.summary: Evaluates the current filters and applies the filtering to the collection view of the items control.

member.name: T:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl
member.summary: This class is the control hosting all information needed for filtering of one column. Filtering is enabled by simply adding this control to the header template of the DataGridColumn.

member.name: F:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl._activeFilter
member.summary: The active filter for this column.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.Filter
member.summary: The user provided filter (IFilter) or content (usually a string) used to filter this column. If the filter object implements IFilter, it will be used directly as the filter, else the filter object will be passed to the content filter.

member.name: F:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.FilterProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Filter dependency property

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.Values
member.summary: Returns all distinct visible (filtered) values of this column as string. This can be used to e.g. feed the ItemsSource of an AutoCompleteBox to give a hint to the user what to enter.
member.remarks: You may need to include "NotifyOnTargetUpdated=true" in the binding of the DataGrid.ItemsSource to get up-to-date values when the source object changes.

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.SourceValues
member.summary: Returns all distinct source values of this column as string. This can be used to e.g. feed the ItemsSource of an Excel-like auto-filter.
member.remarks: You may need to include "NotifyOnTargetUpdated=true" in the binding of the DataGrid.ItemsSource to get up-to-date values when the source object changes.

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.IsFiltered
member.summary: Returns a flag indicating whether this column has some filter condition to evaluate or not. If there is no filter condition we don't need to invoke this filter.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.Matches(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if the given item matches the filter condition for this column.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.ValuesUpdated
member.summary: Notification of the filter that the content of the values might have changed.

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.Column
member.summary: Gets the column this control is hosting the filter for.

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.DataGrid
member.summary: The DataGrid we belong to.

ensures.vb: Me.FilterHost = Nothing OrElse Contract.Result(Of System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid)() <> Nothing

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.FilterHost
member.summary: The filter we belong to.

ensures.vb: Contract.Result(Of DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterHost)() = Nothing OrElse Me.DataGrid <> Nothing

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.ColumnHeader
member.summary: The column header of the column we are filtering. This control must be a child element of the column header.

member.summary: Identifies the CellValue dependency property, a private helper property used to evaluate the property path for the list items.

member.summary: Examines the property path and returns the objects value for this column. Filtering is applied on the SortMemberPath, this is the path used to create the binding.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.InternalValues
member.summary: Gets the cell content of all list items for this column.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.InternalSourceValues
member.summary: Gets the cell content of all list items for this column.

member.summary: Raises the PropertyChanged event.

member.name: E:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilterColumnControl.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes.

member.name: T:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilteringEventArgs
member.summary:
Notification about additional columns to be filtered. Clients can e.g. use this event to cache/preload column data in a different thread and/or display a wait cursor while filtering.
Clients may only cancel the processing when e.g. the data grid is about to be unloaded. Canceling the process of filtering will cause the UI to be inconsistent.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilteringEventArgs.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The additional columns that will be filtered.

member.name: P:DataGridExtensions.DataGridFilteringEventArgs.Columns
member.summary: Gets the additional columns that will be filtered.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.ExtensionMethods.EnableMultilineEditing(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn)
member.summary: Tweaks the editing element style to enable multi-line editing.
member.remarks: Ctrl+Return will add a new line when editing the cell.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.ExtensionMethods.HasRectangularCellSelection(System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid)
member.summary: Determines whether the cell selection of the data grid is a rectangular range.
member.returns: true if the cell selection is a rectangular range.

member.summary: Gets the content of the selected cells as a table of strings.
member.returns: The selected cell content.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.ExtensionMethods.PasteCells(System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String}})
member.summary: Replaces the selected cells with the data. Cell selection and the data table must have matching dimensions, either 1:n, n:1 or n:x*n.
member.remarks: The cell selection is assumed to be a rectangular area.
member.returns: true if the dimensions of data and cell selection did match and the cells data has been replaced; otherwise false.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.ExtensionMethods.GetVisibleSelectedCells(System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid)
member.summary: Gets the selected cells that are in visible columns.
member.returns: The selected cells of visible columns.

AttachedPropertyComments.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if multi line editing is enabled for the specified text column.
AttachedPropertyComments.remarks: This property can only be set to true once, toggling the value will have no further effect.

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.Tools.GetForceCommitOnLostFocus(System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if a commit will be forced on the data grid when it looses the focus.
member.returns: true if a commit will be forced for the data grid when it looses the focus

member.name: M:DataGridExtensions.Tools.SetForceCommitOnLostFocus(System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a value that indicates if a commit will be forced on the data grid when it looses the focus.
member.param: If set to true a commit will be forced on the data grid when it looses the focus.

member.name: F:DataGridExtensions.Tools.ForceCommitOnLostFocusProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ForceCommitOnLostFocus dependency property
